passages.text:
You're playing hide and seek with your 3 other siblings. Pick a location to hide in. 

[[Go straight->Down the Hall]] 
[[Go left->To the Kitchen]]
passages.name: Living Room

passages.text:
You come across several doors lining the hall. These doors lead to different bedrooms. 

[[Go straight->Parent's Room]]
[[Go right->Your Room]]
[[Go left->Brother's room]]
[[Turn around->Living Room]]
passages.name: Down the Hall

passages.text:
You slid into the kitchen hoping to find the best hiding spot. You glance around the room and smile. 

[[Hide under the sink->Code Spy]] 
[[Hide under the table->Get Caught]] 
[[Go back->Living Room]]
passages.name: To the Kitchen

passages.text:
You try and turn the knob but find that the door has been locked. Your parents must have gotten annoyed with you playing in there. 

[[Turn around->Living Room]] 
[[Try your room->Your Room]] 
[[Try your brother's room->Brother's room]] 
[[Hide behind the potted plant in the corner->Get Caught]]

links.name: Hide behind the potted plant in the corner

passages.name: Parent's Room

passages.text:
You've entered your rather clean bedroom, thanks to your parents that is. You look around the room to devise a plan on finding the best spot. 

[[Jump into the closet->Code Spy]]
[[Hide behind the stack of stuffed animals->Get Caught]] 
[[Change your mind and find a new spot->To the Kitchen]] 
[[Go back the way you came->Down the Hall]]

links.name: Hide behind the stack of stuffed animals
Change your mind and find a new spot
Go back the way you came

passages.name: Your Room

passages.text:
You stumble on a pile of dirty clothes upon entering the room. Gross. There is an odd stench lingering in the room, must be the week old chicken nuggets on the desk. 

[[On second thought, your room sounds better->Your Room]]
[[Slip underneath the bed->Get Caught]] 
[[Make a run for the kitchen->To the Kitchen]] 
[[Hide behind the door->Code Spy]]

links.name: On second thought, your room sounds better
Make a run for the kitchen

passages.name: Brother's room

passages.text:
Boo! Your brother found your hiding spot. 

[[Try a different location->Living Room]]
passages.name: Get Caught

passages.text:
You hide for over 5 minutes. You soon get bored and go find what happened to your other siblings. You find them watching tv because they got annoyed they couldn't find you. 

[[Watch TV->Living Room]]
passages.name: Code Spy
